name: Demake Zakum (Maplestory fan-game)
description:
I remade my favorite boss from Maplestory, Zakum.

You can play as 2 classes, Warrior or Mage. Consider this game in a prototype stage, not everything is implemented or feature complete because I made this as an experiment for my youtube channel.

Controlls:

Player 1:

move: W, S, A, D

Spells: 1, Q, 2

Player 2:

move: Arrow keys

Spells: M,   ","(comma),      "."(Dot)
